body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello, thank you for calling Mitchels' Bakery Solutions. My name is Terry Mitchell. How can I assist you today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Hi Terry, this is Carol Stewart. I am having some issues with the data management system.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: I’m sorry to hear that, Carol. Can you please provide me with a brief description of the issue you’re encountering?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Well, our inventory data seems to be incorrect. It's showing we have seven zero bread loaves when we actually have less in stock.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: I see, that could be quite frustrating. Can I get your customer ID to look into your account information?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Sure, my customer ID is one two three four five.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you. Just one more thing, can you please verify the last four digits of the contact phone number on your account?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: The last four digits are one two three four.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Perfect, got it. I’ll take a look at your inventory data now… It looks like there was a sync issue with the system. I’ll correct the data for you.

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Thank you so much, Terry. I was really worried about it.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: You're welcome, Carol. I'm glad I could help. If you notice this problem again, please don't hesitate to call us back. Thank you for your time, and have a great day!
